concept.title: Draw straight lines
concept.shortdesc: Use the Line tool when you want to draw a single straight line.

ol.li:
Do one of the following:
Position the mouse at where you want the line to start, then start dragging till where you want the line to end
Put the mouse near or over an element so that hot spots appear, start dragging from a hot spot to another element's hot spot, a line is drawn and this is set as a 'connector' between these two hot spots.
Click the canvas where you want a line of the same dimensions as the last drawn line to appear
